item.title: Staying Rusty
item.description: I've ordered a copy of the book by Steve Klabnik and Carol Nichols 'The Rust Programming Language'. I was following development of Rust for last two years, reading various blogs and posts by it's community members, and decided that this is the year when I will get my feet wet in Rust. Before this I was writing fair amount of C, and was familiar with programming in C++ and Assembly. As I was EE major I was exposed to various lower levels of logic and programming and I liked it.
